name: FANDR downloading
description:
this game still is still development

story game coming soon : https://sgames-devoping.itch.io/fandr2

welcome to FANDR Vbeta 0.1 (the newest version) this is an early version of FANDR 1.0 

when you start there will be an intro then there will be a start button click that select singleplayer than click hider and play there will be 5-12 people chasing you and go to the purple guy who is the FANDR and have him run into the blue guys than you will win (you can click transform for 5 seconds to confuse them or click 1) but if they touch you than you lose

if you click finder than try to get the red guy tagged and work with other fnders but dont touch the purple guy
